casebody.data:
Leroy MARTIN, Jr., Appellant,
v.
The STATE of Florida, Appellee. No. 3D18-1517 District Court of Appeal of Florida, Third District. Opinion filed December 4, 2018. Leroy Martin Jr., in proper person. Pamela Jo Bondi, Attorney General, for appellee. Before SUAREZ, LOGUE, and LINDSEY, JJ. PER CURIAM.

Affirmed.

ANY POST-OPINION MOTION MUST BE FILED WITHIN SEVEN DAYS. A RESPONSE TO THE POST-OPINION MOTION MAY BE FILED WITHIN FIVE DAYS THEREAFTER.
